大化の改新: (たいかのかいしん) - Taika Reform of 645CE
大化前代: (たいかぜんだい) - period in the sixth and seventh centuries prior to the Taika reform

大厄: (たいやく) - calamity; disaster; great misfortune; grand climacteric
大原女: (おおはらめ) - woman peddler in Kyoto from Ohara (typically with a bundle of sticks, etc. on her head)
大反魂草: (オオハンゴンソウ) - cutleaf coneflower (Rudbeckia laciniata); greenhead coneflower
大取: (おおとり) - key performer; last performer of the day
大取り: (おおとり) - key performer; last performer of the day
大取りより小取り: (おおとりよりことり) - it is wiser to make money steadily over time; light gains make heavy purse; better small takings than a large win
大受け: (おおうけ) - big hit; great success
大口: (おおくち) - big mouth; boastful speech/tall talk; (ant: 小口・こぐち・2) large amount/large sum
大口をたたく: (おおくちをたたく) - to boast; to brag; to exaggerate
大口を叩く: (おおくちをたたく) - to boast; to brag; to exaggerate
大口バス: (オオグチバス) - largemouth bass (Micropterus salmoides); bigmouth bass
大口顧客: (おおくちこきゃく) - large customer; major account
大口魚: (タラ) - gadid (any fish of the family Gadidae, incl. cod, haddock, whiting and pollack); Pacific cod (Gadus macrocephalus)
大台: (おおだい) - (stock) 100-yen unit; high level (of stock prices)
大同: (だいどう) - largely the same; Daidou era (806.5.18-810.9.19)
大同団結: (だいどうだんけつ) - (yoji) merger; (presenting a) united front
大同小異: (だいどうしょうい) - (yoji) essentially the same with only minor differences
大名: (だいみょう) - daimyo (Japanese feudal lord); daimio
大名屋敷: (だいみょうやしき) - daimyo's mansion
大名旅行: (だいみょうりょこう) - (yoji) traveling in luxury; travelling in luxury; junket
大名行列: (だいみょうぎょうれつ) - daimyo's procession
大向う: (おおむこう) - gallery (of a theatre); audience (at a theatre)/the masses/the general public
大向こう: (おおむこう) - gallery (of a theatre); audience (at a theatre)/the masses/the general public
大吟醸: (だいぎんじょう) - top-quality sake brewed from rice grains milled to 50% of weight or less
大呂: (たいろ) - second note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. D sharp) (in China); twelfth lunar month
大味: (おおあじ) - lack of taste/flat taste/blandness; dullness (e.g. of performance)/flatness/lack of imagination
大命: (たいめい) - imperial or royal command
大和: (やまと) - Yamato/ancient province corresponding to modern-day Nara Prefecture; (ancient) Japan; Japanese
大和ゴキブリ: (ヤマトゴキブリ) - Japanese cockroach (Periplaneta japonica)
大和三山: (やまとさんざん) - Three Mountains of Yamato (Mt. Miminashi, Mt. Kagu, and Mt. Unebi)
大和小灰蝶: (ヤマトシジミ) - pale grass blue (species of gossamer-winged butterfly, Pseudozizeeria maha)
大和島根: (やまとしまね) - (yoji) the island country of Japan; the Japanese Isles
大和心: (やまとごころ) - the Japanese spirit
大和撫子: (ヤマトナデシコ) - (yoji)  large pink (Dianthus superbus var. longicalycinus); woman who displays the feminine virtues of old Japan
大和文: (やまとぶみ) - Japanese text; sentence in Japanese
大和文字: (やまともじ) - Japanese syllabary symbols; kana
大和時代: (やまとじだい) - Yamato period (300-550 CE)
大和歌: (やまとうた) - Japanese poem; waka; tanka
大和沼蝦: (ヤマトヌマエビ) - Yamato shrimp (Caridina multidentata); Amano shrimp
大和煮: (やまとに) - beef boiled with soy sauce, ginger and sugar
大和琴: (やまとごと) - ancient Japanese koto (thought to be native to Japan)
大和真蜱: (ヤマトマダニ) - Ixodes ovatus (species of tick)
大和絵: (やまとえ) - Yamato-e (classical Japan decorative paintings)
大和芋: (やまといも) - variety of Japanese potato
大和蜆: (ヤマトシジミ) - Corbicula japonica (species of basket clam)
大和蜆蝶: (ヤマトシジミ) - pale grass blue (species of gossamer-winged butterfly, Pseudozizeeria maha)
大和言葉: (やまとことば) - ancient or primordial Japanese language
大商人: (おおあきんど) - major dealer; wealthy merchant
大喜利: (おおぎり) - (大切り, 大切 only) large cut (e.g. of meat); last piece of the day's programme/last act of a play/comic dialogue as the last item in vaudeville, music hall, etc.
大喝: (だいかつ) - shouting in a thunderous voice
大喝一声: (だいかついっせい) - (yoji) shouting in a thunderous voice; blustering out
大喧嘩: (おおげんか) - quarrel; huge fight; big row
大喪の礼: (たいそうのれい) - funeral service of a Japanese emperor
大嘗会: (だいじょうえ) - banquet on the occasion of the first ceremonial offering of rice by the newly-enthroned emperor
大嘗祭: (おおなめまつり) - first ceremonial offering of rice by newly-enthroned Emperor
大嘴海烏: (オオハシウミガラス) - razorbill (Alca torda)
大器: (たいき) - large container; person of great talent
大器晩成: (たいきばんせい) - (yoji) Great talents mature late
大噴火: (だいふんか) - major volcanic eruption; large-scale eruption; violent eruption; great eruption
大四喜: (だいスーシー) - {mahj} big four winds (chi:); winning hand containing four kongs or pungs of winds
大回り: (おおまわり) - wide turn; detour; the long way around
大回転: (だいかいてん) - the giant slalom
大団円: (だいだんえん) - denouement; ending; conclusion; (grand) finale
大国: (たいこく) - large country; major powers
大国主命: (おおくにぬしのみこと) - Okuninushi; deity of magic and medicine later viewed as equivalent to Daikokuten and celebrated at Izumo Grand Shrine
大国主神: (おおくにぬしのかみ) - Okuninushi; deity of magic and medicine later viewed as equivalent to Daikokuten and celebrated at Izumo Grand Shrine
大国主義: (たいこくしゅぎ) - (yoji) policy favouring major powers (favoring); policy of great powers favorable only to themselves
大圏コース: (たいけんコース) - great circle route
